q4.summary: Amazon S3 Select allows existing customers to query and filter data from S3 objects using SQL, reducing data transfer costs and latency. It supports CSV, JSON, and Apache Parquet formats but is no longer available to new customers.

q4.summary: This documentation provides an overview of the SQL elements supported by Amazon S3 Select, including the SELECT command and its supported clauses. Note that Amazon S3 Select is no longer available to new customers.

q4.text:
Learn more
Amazon S3 Select supports the following operators. Logical operators
• AND
• NOT
• OR
Comparison operators
• <
• >
• <=
• >=
• =
• <>
• !=
• BETWEEN
• IN – For example: IN ('a', 'b', 'c')
